news.headline: Bajaj Finserv Q4 FY25 Net Profit Jumps 16% to ₹4,756 Crore
news.text: Bajaj Finserv reported a 16.4% year-on-year increase in consolidated net profit for Q4 FY25, amounting to ₹4,756 crore. Revenue for the quarter grew by 14.2% to ₹36,596 crore, driven by strong performance across its lending, insurance, and wealth management segments. The company's profit before tax rose by 8.6% to ₹6,002 crore.
positivePoints: 8.6% YoY rise in profit before tax

news.headline: Bajaj Finserv Declares ₹1 Final Dividend for FY25
news.text: The board of Bajaj Finserv has recommended a final dividend of ₹1 per equity share for the financial year 2024-25, subject to shareholder approval at the upcoming Annual General Meeting. This dividend reflects the company's commitment to rewarding its shareholders amidst strong financial performance.

news.headline: Bajaj Finserv's FY25 Net Profit Increases 9% to ₹8,872 Crore
news.text: For the full fiscal year 2024-25, Bajaj Finserv reported a consolidated net profit of ₹8,872 crore, a 9% increase over the previous year. Total income for the year reached ₹1,33,822 crore, reflecting a 21% rise from the previous fiscal year. The company's diversified business model contributed to its steady growth amidst a dynamic economic landscape.

news.headline: Bajaj Finserv Share Price Rises 4% Amid Positive Earnings
news.text: As of May 12, 2025, Bajaj Finserv's share price rose by 4.1%, trading at ₹2,051. This increase follows the company's strong Q4 FY25 earnings report, which showcased robust financial performance across its business segments. The stock has delivered a 30.46% return over the past year, indicating positive investor sentiment.
